item.title: Npc kills
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

You do not need a string… You need to use an integer. You don’t even need the String KBDSUCKSBALLS = kbdkillz;
Because you’re not using the “KBDSUCKSBALLS” in the if statement.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc kills

item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

Clawz fury:

Why would you use a string to hold an integer, when there is a datatype for holding an integer?

You know that you’re gonna ask questions like this and start crying at the code children produce when you read that the base is “allstarscape”

item.title: Npc kills
item.dc:creator: @OGolemX OGolemX
item.description:
@OGolemX wrote:

im using allstarscape source and i wanna make something like when u kill and npc like kbd you get a kbd kill point, i know you need a string and stuff, but i just dont know how to make the code like

if (player.killedNPCAmount(50, 1)
String KBDSUCKSBALLS = kbdkillz;
kbdkillz = +1
}

how would i make something like that, i know i didnt make the code right there but i just typed it quick to let you know what i want.

Read full topic
